productName: Repairing Lip Mask 1% Ceramides + Hyaluronic Acid
productShortDesc: Combines the replenishing benefits of ceramides with hydrating hyaluronic acid to repair chapped lips. Within 15 minutes, lips are supple and comforted. 98% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Principal actives
Ceramides (1%):
These lipids are naturally present between the cells of the stratum corneum. Ceramides act as intercellular cement, reinforcing the cutaneous barrier and limiting dehydration. They help protect and nourish lips.
Hyaluronic acid:
Able to retain up to 1000 times its weight in water, this macromolecule instantly hydrates lips and protects them from dehydration. It helps soften and smooth the look of fine lines.
Mango Butter:
Rich in essential fatty acids, this butter melts onto skin and forms a protective barrier that helps repair chapping and damage.
The Lip Mask has an enveloping balm-gel texture that helps repair and soothe chapped lips.
How to apply the Lip Mask
There are two ways to use the Lip Mask:
1. Apply a generous layer to lips and leave on for 15 minutes. Remove excess with a cotton pad.
2. Apply the repairing mask in a thick layer in the evening and leave on overnight.
If your lips are severely chapped or damaged, use nightly.
Optimize the effectiveness of this mask, by first using our
concentrated in exfoliating actives to remove dead skin cells.
Unlike other skin, our lips do not produce sebum and are therefore more vulnerable to external aggressors. Dead skin and chapping are the signs of lip dehydration.
Enriched with ceramides and hyaluronic acid, the Lip Mask helps repair chapped, damaged lips thanks to two mechanisms: it forms a protective film that limits water evaporation and reinforces the skin barrier.
